sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Generate queue numbers for all queues that do not yet have them.</description>
        <name>Add missing queue numbers</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var numberMgr = new NumberManager('awa_queue');

var qGR = new GlideRecord('awa_queue');
qGR.addNullQuery('number');
qGR.orderBy('sys_created_on');
qGR.query();
while (qGR.next()) {
	qGR.setValue('number', numberMgr.getNextObjNumberPadded());
	qGR.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-02-12 01:06:38</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>d8a5144a73ef23004a905ee515f6a750</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Add missing queue numbers</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">7f858779db01111086a072c7f496190d</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d8a5144a73ef23004a905ee515f6a750</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-02-13 00:46:17</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
